coreAttributes.name: Imperial Blade
coreAttributes.description: A standard-issue but heavy driveblade. The first type of sucsessful driveblade ever made. Favored by the male imperial knights for its consistant damage, it also bares consistantly lower elemental capibility.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Prime your blade and perform a drive attack on [npc2.Name] with it.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(fasten)] the driveblade to [npc.her] back, With the cartridge in, and gears locked on for later use.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the bat blade from [npc.her] waist, [npc.verb(unload)] it's active cartridge and [npc.verb(store)] it for later.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(prime)] [npc.her] blade before slicing [npc2.name], the sword passing through [npc2.her] body before weakly expelling its element, heating to its bright molten yellow phase. The heavy whiriling of the gears slow to a hum before the cartridge disengages and falls to the ground, Spent.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(cleave)] [npc.her] blade through [npc2.Name]'s chest causing the cutter to weakly discharge its element before the blade heats to a bright molten yellow. The blade's gears slow to a soft hum before the cartridge disengages and falls away.

With an swift step forwards,[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] the blade through [npc2.name] piercing [npc2.her] diffusing the blade's elemental charge. As the blade finishes its initial burst it flairs into its usual bright molten yellow. The blade's gears slow to a dull whir before its cartridge disengages and falls out of it's socket.

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(prime)] [npc.her] blade before slicing at [npc2.name], The blade discharges early turning the blade molten yellow before missing completely. The gears whir to almost a stop before the cartridge unlocks.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(cleave)] [npc.her] blade at [npc2.Name], but [npc.verb(miss)] [npc2.her] narrowly, not long after the blade super heats and the cartridge deactivates before falling to the ground.

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(thrust)] [npc.her] sword at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(lose)] [npc.her] balance, [npc.her] strike falling well short of [npc.her] target, [Npc2.name]. The blade glows into its molten phase before slowing its hum and discharging its cartridge.
